Omg, I want this Lego parts right now! When i was a kid Lego was my favorite toys to play, now I'm 18 years old and i want to play with that shuttle so bad. XD

Helldiver, amazing!

You once told me that "you don't do requests." What's next? Deep space?

Well, if that is KSP,

should the KSOS not be more like this,

instead of this?

nop..... it's more like this:

Okay luizopiloto, you are right. And i always liked Matchbox alot. But i also always tell my Kids not to throw the Matchbox Toys into the Lego Chest.

Don't get me wrong, i really like this mod. i never play KSP without it. But that is one of the reasons why i wish it would be a little bit more compatible with parts from KSP or other mods.

nononononononononononono

it's more a like this:

nop..... it's more like this:

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ZEBP3s10B7w/Te4jmBUTduI/AAAAAAAAp8A/PvyxUfbng2Y/s640/802_space+shuttle.jpg

Oh MY GOD!!! i had exactly this one when i was a child

So much of my childhood memory came back, thank you!

i remember the ejection seat, the cargo and everything!!!
Things are coming together nicely for Phase 4! I can't wait!
Isn't it more like this....

Isn't it more like this....

http://gasstationtoytrucks.com/images/1999-hess-toy-truck-and-space-shuttle-with-statellite.jpg

I see that HESS likes it's name being plastered everywhere

I see that HESS likes it's name being plastered everywhere

Off-topic aside: HESS has been commissioning pretty exquisite toy vehicles for over 50 years. They release one per year. My 4 y/o son got the 2012 helicopter+rescue vehicle a couple years ago and it's still one of his favorite toys.
I don't mean to sound like a derp but the links on the first page dont seem to be working. I need that Space Station pack. Is it included in the whole package?
At the Moment the Station parts are part of the whole Package. I think the single Links will work after the release of Phase 4.

I don't mean to sound like a derp but the links on the first page dont seem to be working. I need that Space Station pack. Is it included in the whole package?

Hit refresh on your browser. I had to update the license information. Which will get updated again just before Phase IV release.
Speaking of the phase 4 release.....when? I need all of those uselessly amazing utility vehicles NOAW!

Speaking of the phase 4 release.....when? I need all of those uselessly amazing utility vehicles NOAW!

Its currently in testing. I believe the correct response is: Soon.

Also, helldiver, I'm loving the OP... its looking nice.

EDIT:

Also... Nazari... your Rover Delivery system fits perfectly in the Super 25... but cant really land on the Mun... not from 15k up anyway:

Edited August 21, 2014 by Avalon304

Its currently in testing. I believe the correct response is: Soon.

Also, helldiver, I'm loving the OP... its looking nice.

EDIT:

Also... Nazari... your Rover Delivery system fits perfectly in the Super 25... but cant really land on the Mun... not from 15k up anyway:

http://i.imgur.com/Yt3Cd5c.png

Nazari's lander has about half the deltaV required to land the rover from low mun orbit (14km). So you'll have to build your own. I posted my fully monoprop lander a few pages back.

Saw it... Sorry, but is ugly. Naz's looks better... gonna have to tweak it to give it the proper deltaV. Maybe use the mono prop engines... dunno... need to tweak its balance too... it goes crazy at anything above 1/8th thrust...

Was the Super 25 being so glossy intentional? I mean the small shuttle's got very matte looking textures (like the stock textures), but the Super 25 looks like a plastic toy next to it. It's not as noticable on the white bits, but it's very much so when the sun hits the black tiling on the bottom of the fuselage.

I'm happy to see that Phase 4 is nearly ready for release! I plan on strapping an Ion Drive to a bus and put it into space using the super 25, sort of like one of the testers did. I don't feel like trying to turn the Super 25 into a SSTO (the most editing I do to the stock shuttle .craft files is adding docking ports where they need to be, and putting a KSO Mechjeb module on the Super 25 for precise in-orbit burns).

Its currently in testing. I believe the correct response is: Soon.

Also... Nazari... your Rover Delivery system fits perfectly in the Super 25... but cant really land on the Mun... not from 15k up anyway:

Nazari's lander has about half the deltaV required to land the rover from low mun orbit (14km). So you'll have to build your own. I posted my fully monoprop lander a few pages back.

The rover delivery vehicle is meant to be brought to the mun by another lander. That said, I threw it together in a few minutes to give an example; didn't pull out delta-v charts or anything.

I know this is hard to tell, but my laptop has no wifi at my place i am staying at this weekend.

Will KSO be released before 5:00 Friday Night, CST?

Anyone? Please answer meh!

Anyone? Please answer meh!

There is no set time for the release. All we know is soon.
I'm calling that today it is released!

I'm calling that today it is released!

It will be released when it is ready, and not a moment before.
